title: nearby places to hangout
content: where do people usually go to eat/drink close to campus?

comments.body:
there are plenty of options..

1. Sutta gali
2. GJB Cafetaria (like 3 restaurants are there)
3. Anna Kuteera (which is about 1.5 km from clg , but heard pretty good reviews from my friends)
4. 13th floor canteen

There are many eateries nearby pes.. but ya it will take you some time to travel so quite not recommended during breaks
The og SLN bar and Restaurant
